Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameSetting

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameSetting
public class GameSetting
extends java.lang.Object
Class GameSetting defines a class that represent the game data, it first read all custom game components from json files and then let the player customize these classes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameSetting​(int numberOfPlayers)
    Construct a Game Setting that creates all the default class from json files meanwhile checking their authenticity and integrity.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameSetting

      public GameSetting​(int numberOfPlayers) throws java.io.IOException, JsonFileModificationError
      Construct a Game Setting that creates all the default class from json files meanwhile checking their authenticity and integrity.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the number of player of the game.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's some error during the reading of a json file.
      JsonFileModificationError - if a json file is not written correctly.
